price: except he who does wrong, then substitutes good for evil, then I am indeed All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسۡنَۢا بَعۡدَ سُوٓءٖ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
